Here is tidyverse
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100))
```

Here is a plot
```{r}
plot_df |> 
ggplot (aes(x=x, y=y)) +
geom_point()
```
